scripts.lint: npm -w packages/backend run lint && npm -w packages/frontend run lint
scripts.test: cross-env NODE_ENV=test npm -w packages/backend run test && npm -w packages/frontend run test
scripts.docker:dev:prepare-offline: docker compose -f ./docker/dev/docker-compose.yml --env-file .env.development build && docker compose -f ./docker/dev/docker-compose.yml --env-file .env.development pull
scripts.docker:dev:migrate: docker exec -t dev-budget-tracker-app bash -c 'cd /app/packages/backend && npx sequelize-cli db:migrate'
scripts.docker:dev:migrate-undo: docker exec -t dev-budget-tracker-app bash -c 'cd /app/packages/backend && npx sequelize-cli db:migrate:undo'
scripts.docker:prod: docker compose -f ./docker/prod/docker-compose.yml --env-file .env.production build --no-cache && docker compose -f ./docker/prod/docker-compose.yml --env-file .env.production up
